code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Skills=()=>{const skillCategories=[{icon:'fas fa-code',title:'Programming Languages',skills:['Java','C++','C#','JavaScript']},{icon:'fas fa-server',title:'Backend Technologies',skills:['Spring Boot','J2EE','Hibernate','Node.js','Express.js','.NET','REST APIs','JWT']},{icon:'fas fa-globe',title:'Frontend Technologies',skills:['React.js','HTML5','CSS3','JavaScript','Bootstrap']},{icon:'fas fa-database',title:'Database & Tools',skills:['MySQL','MongoDB','Git','GitHub','Linux','Docker','Bash','VS Code']},{icon:'fas fa-graduation-cap',title:'Coursework',skills:['Data Structures','Algorithms','Operating Systems','DBMS','OOP','Computer Networks']},{icon:'fas fa-users',title:'Soft Skills',skills:['Communication','Problem Solving','Teamwork','Critical Thinking','Agile Methodologies']}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"skills",className:"section skills",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title",children:"Skills & Technologies"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{fontSize:'1.1rem',color:'#6b7280',marginBottom:'2rem'},children:"I work with a wide range of technologies and tools to deliver high-quality solutions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skills-grid",children:skillCategories.map((category,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skill-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skill-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:category.icon})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"skill-title",children:category.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"skill-list",children:category.skills.map((skill,skillIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:skill},skillIndex))})]},index))})]})]})});};export default Skills;
